DOC.detailed_description: Rapid diagnosis treatment acute ischemic stroke critical reduce disability death cause stroke . While recombinant tissue plasminogen activator , rt-PA , approve treatment acute ischemic stroke , less 2-3 percent individual stroke actually receive treatment . The inability capture acute ischemic stroke case within 3 hour symptom onset one critical factor . Populations high risk stroke significantly undereducated need rapid , intervention upon onset stroke symptom . This especially true among vulnerable population include African Americans , Hispanics , poor . The purpose study evaluate effectiveness 2-session , culturally-sensitive , interactive stroke educational program compare standard educational material usual care . In study , scientist determine interactive program increase knowledge stroke , result earlier arrival emergency room case stroke . The study enroll 1400 individual stroke transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) . Participants randomize receive usual medical care——which include standard educational information stroke , stroke warn sign risk factors——or usual medical care plus 2-session interactive stroke educational program . All participant administer pre post ( 30 day 1 year ) intervention stroke knowledge/behavior survey . In additional , participant contact every 12 month check health status document new stroke event associated emergency room arrival time . The SWIFT study part Specialized Program Translational Research Acute Stroke ( SPOTRIAS ) , seek understand certain people may increase risk stroke . The goal study increase stroke knowledge , change behavior , improve emergency room arrival time upon onset stroke symptom .
